See3 Documentation

Next-Gen Authenticity Tech For Digital Media

Read Introduction
Read Specification
Use see3-js (alpha)

see3-js

A JavaScript library for creating, embedding and verifying cryptographic proofs in digital media. It lets you integrate content security tech seamlessly into web and mobile applications.

Wink

An React Native demo app that utilizes see3-js for capturing and verifying authenticated images. It demonstrates how to implement See3 technology in mobile apps.

Mayor

Mayor enables trusted developers to automatically issue trust certificates to hardware-attested devices, including mobile devices, for use with see3-js.

Gov'nor

The central governance system of See3, which maintains the integrity and trustworthiness of the entire See3 ecosystem. It plays a crucial role in enforcing security standards and operational protocols.
